description:

He was both nervous and excited when he met Oscar. Both guys are incredibly hot but in very opposite ways. Oscar is smooth while Hayden is hairy. Both have lean defined bodies and an eager sense of adventure when it comes to sex (and you can't go wrong with that).

“No.”

Oscar stood up and unzipped his pants so that Hayden could take a look. “What do you think?”

“It’s nice,” he replied shyly with a look of excitement on his face.

Oscar joked around with Hayden, kind of giving a sense there was quite a bit of chemistry, even flirting between the two. But I think a lot of it had to do with Hayden’s anticipation about getting fucked. He was ready for it, probably even more so when he saw Oscar’s hard dick spring out of his pants and into his mouth. Hayden just might be reconsidering his preference for topping after this!
title: Oscar & Hayden
